sense.gloss: to look after, to take care of, to keep, to hold on to, to keep in custody
to be put in charge of, to be given responsibility for, to be entrusted with
to withhold (an announcement), to reserve (judgment), to leave undecided
to take upon oneself (to do), to settle (a matter) oneself

sdata.j: ↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓は↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑金↑↓かね↓を↑預↑↓|あず↓かる|。
sdata.e: The bank keeps money for people.

sdata.j: お↑互↑↓たが↓いに↑利益↑↓りえき↓の↑分↑↓わ↓け↑前↑↓まえ↓に|あずかる|ことにしよう。
sdata.e: Let's agree to share in the profits.

sdata.j: ↑地価↑↓ちか↓が↑上↑↓あ↓がり↑続↑↓つづ↓ければ↑私↑↓わたし↓はかなりの↑利益↑↓りえき↓に|あずかる|ことになろう。
sdata.e: I'll come in for a nice profit if land values continue to rise.
